content.raw: Thank you very much, hopefully I will contribute more :)
content.html: Thank you very much, hopefully I will contribute more :)

Looks good to me.

@jvgomez, thanks for the pull request! This is the first external contribution that we merge.

I'm happy, like drone.io.

update.description:
Caused by some variables between double quotes within a string. Concretely:

```
jabuntu14@ubuntu:~/Desktop/ign-transport/build$ sudo make uninstall
Scanning dependencies of target uninstall
CMake Warning (dev) in cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:
  Syntax Warning in cmake code at

    /home/jabuntu14/Desktop/ign-transport/build/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:2:55

  Argument not separated from preceding token by whitespace.
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.

CMake Warning (dev) in cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:
  Syntax Warning in cmake code at

    /home/jabuntu14/Desktop/ign-transport/build/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:8:33

  Argument not separated from preceding token by whitespace.
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.

CMake Warning (dev) in cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:
  Syntax Warning in cmake code at

    /home/jabuntu14/Desktop/ign-transport/build/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:11:86

  Argument not separated from preceding token by whitespace.
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.

CMake Warning (dev) in cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:
  Syntax Warning in cmake code at

    /home/jabuntu14/Desktop/ign-transport/build/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:16:51

  Argument not separated from preceding token by whitespace.
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.

CMake Warning (dev) in cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:
  Syntax Warning in cmake code at

    /home/jabuntu14/Desktop/ign-transport/build/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake:19:27

  Argument not separated from preceding token by whitespace.
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.

-- Uninstalling /usr/local/include/ignition/transport/config.hh""
```

__Updated__: Included @scpeters modification to allow folder paths with spaces.
update.title: Fixes uninstall warnings

content.raw:
[I did this for gazebo too](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/904/fix-uninstall-script-to-handle-folder/diff), and I added the following as well to allow for uninstallation from folders with spaces in the name:
~~~
diff -ru ../cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in ~/osrf/gazebo/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in
--- ../cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in	2015-03-05 02:22:10.000000000 -0800
+++ /Users/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in	2015-03-03 00:26:07.000000000 -0800
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@
   message(STATUS "Uninstalling $ENV{DESTDIR}${file}")
   if(IS_SYMLINK "$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}" OR EXISTS "$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}")
     exec_program(
-      "@CMAKE_COMMAND@" ARGS "-E remove $ENV{DESTDIR}${file}"
+      "@CMAKE_COMMAND@" ARGS "-E remove \"$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}\""
       OUTPUT_VARIABLE rm_out
       RETURN_VALUE rm_retval
       )
~~~
content.html:
I did this for gazebo too, and I added the following as well to allow for uninstallation from folders with spaces in the name:

diff -ru ../cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in ~/osrf/gazebo/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in
--- ../cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in   2015-03-05 02:22:10.000000000 -0800
+++ /Users/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in  2015-03-03 00:26:07.000000000 -0800
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@
   message(STATUS "Uninstalling $ENV{DESTDIR}${file}")
   if(IS_SYMLINK "$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}" OR EXISTS "$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}")
     exec_program(
-      "@CMAKE_COMMAND@" ARGS "-E remove $ENV{DESTDIR}${file}"
+      "@CMAKE_COMMAND@" ARGS "-E remove \"$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}\""
       OUTPUT_VARIABLE rm_out
       RETURN_VALUE rm_retval
       )
